meanings.definition: A daughter of one's stepmother or stepfather by a previous marriage.
meanings.sent1: My stepsister and I share a stepmother from her previous marriage.
meanings.sent2: I have a stepsister who is the daughter of my stepmother's ex-husband.
meanings.sent3: When my stepsister and I argue, we joke that we must have been enemies in a past life.
meanings.sent4: Having a stepsister is like gaining a new teammate in the family game of life.
meanings.sent5: My stepsister's presence in our home added a new dynamic to our family dynamics.

meanings.sent1: My stepsister is my spouse's sister.
meanings.sent2: I have a stepsister who is related to my spouse.
meanings.sent3: When my stepsister visits, we always have a great time as a family.
meanings.sent4: Being close to my stepsister-in-law makes family gatherings more enjoyable.
meanings.sent5: My stepsister-in-law brings a lot of joy and laughter to our family events.
